content:
Colonel Natalia Humeniuk commented on the attacks of the Russian occupation army on the night of March 25, 2024, in particular, drone attacks in Odessa and Mykolaiv regions.

Natalia Humeniuk provided her comments duringlive etherThe only news Telelorphone.

In particular, she said, a characteristic feature of this attack was the work of hostile tactical aviation.

“The drone attack of this night was concentrated by the enemy in Odesa region and Mykolaiv region. A characteristic feature of this attack was that before the measure of the drones from the Black Sea, the enemy worked as a tactical aviation, and from the aircraft was released a rocket type X-31P anti-radiolocation, which the enemy obviously tried to neutralize the air defense systems, ”Natalia Gumeniuk said .

According to her, the X-31P rocket lost its combat capacity in the air. In this case, there was no information about the destruction.

“We hope that it really fell apart in the air and did not hurt anyone. The data is still clarified, ”said the spokeswoman for the South Defense Forces.

As reported by the Army in Mykolaiv region because of enemy attacks on the night of March 25, 2024, more than ten peopleThey were injured.
title: In the defense forces, they told about a characteristic feature
description: Natalia Humeniuk provided her comments during the live broadcasting of "One News". ...
author: Army Inform
